definition: to return a compliment/to give sth in return
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: Gilberto replied immediately and the visitors came close to an equaliser.
sentences.chinese: 吉尔博托马上回敬一球，阿森纳一度接近扳平比分。

sentences.english: An honoured guest should return the toast later in the meal.
sentences.chinese: 本次宴会上一个尊贵的客人要回敬祝酒词。

sentences.english: If it be achieved, I have cause to return thanks.
sentences.chinese: 如果她真是想明白了，我有理由回敬感谢。

sentences.english: In return, a swift fist landed on the officer's neck.
sentences.chinese: 作为回敬，这位警察的脖子上挨了飞快的一拳。

sentences.english: Linares retaliated with a hard left-right combination to Pacquiao's body.
sentences.chinese: 里那雷斯左右组合拳击腹回敬帕奎奥。

sentences.english: If you are rude to me, I shall retaliate with equal rudeness.
sentences.chinese: 如果你对我无礼，我就以同样的无礼予以回敬。

sentences.english: If you are rude me, I shall retaliate with equal rudeness.
sentences.chinese: 如果你对我无礼，那我就以同样的无礼予以回敬。

sentences.english: He took a scornful glance at me when he left my room.
sentences.chinese: 法里亚以极其轻蔑的一瞥回敬了这句讽刺他的话。

sentences.english: 'I'm not going to endure the persecutions of your hospitable ancestors again.
sentences.chinese: 我回敬道，“我可不愿再受你那好客的祖先的迫害了。

sentences.english: Lincoln suggests Si Tan pauses, the letter that writes acrimonious of a content retaliates that fellow.
sentences.chinese: 林肯建议斯坦顿，写一封内容尖刻的信回敬那家伙。

sentences.english: We answered their goal with two quick goals of our own.
sentences.chinese: 我们快速回敬了他们两个球。

sentences.english: But we will send them a message.
sentences.chinese: 但我们也要回敬给他们一条消息。

sentences.english: Murderess while stone when I dare surprised counters with a gun.
sentences.chinese: 女凶手趁着石敢当吃惊的时候回敬了一枪。

sentences.english: “Liar,” I shot back with a grin.
sentences.chinese: “说谎，”我咧着嘴笑，回敬了他一句。

sentences.english: Faria replied to this sarcasm with a glance of profound contempt. They went out.
sentences.chinese: 法里亚以极其轻蔑的一瞥回敬了这句讽刺他的话。

sentences.english: Nehemiah turned to prayer and jesus quoted scripture to renounce the devils's lies.
sentences.chinese: 尼西米用的是祷告耶稣用圣经上话语回敬撒旦谎言。

definition: to go smoothly/to come off/to succeed
to collude with/to collaborate/(basketball) hook shot
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
lit. the guest acts as host (idiom); fig. to turn from passive to active behavior
to reverse (the score)/to pull off a comeback/to take the lead
not to fight back/to take it lying down/to show weakness/to show one's softer side
to fight back/to return fire/to counterattack
to hit the target with one's throw/(basketball) to score
